entry.sentence: While the dead man was brought to the castle , the constables interrogated Patrick , Duchess Alice , Robert and the people from the estate .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (SBAR (IN While) (S (NP (DT the) (JJ dead) (NN man)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VBN brought) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NN castle))))))) (, ,) (NP (DT the) (NNS constables)) (VP (VBD interrogated) (NP (NP (NNP Patrick)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Duchess) (NNP Alice)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Robert)) (CC and) (NP (DT the) (NNS people))) (PP (IN from) (NP (DT the) (NN estate)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: mark(brought-6, While-1) det(man-4, the-2) amod(man-4, dead-3) nsubjpass(brought-6, man-4) auxpass(brought-6, was-5) advcl(interrogated-13, brought-6) det(castle-9, the-8) prep_to(brought-6, castle-9) det(constables-12, the-11) nsubj(interrogated-13, constables-12) root(ROOT-0, interrogated-13) dobj(interrogated-13, Patrick-14) nn(Alice-17, Duchess-16) dobj(interrogated-13, Alice-17) conj_and(Patrick-14, Alice-17) dobj(interrogated-13, Robert-19) conj_and(Patrick-14, Robert-19) det(people-22, the-21) dobj(interrogated-13, people-22) conj_and(Patrick-14, people-22) det(estate-25, the-24) prep_from(interrogated-13, estate-25)

entry.sentence: Two accomplished detectives from Cork arrived .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (CD Two) (JJ accomplished) (NNS detectives)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NNP Cork)))) (VP (VBD arrived)) (. .)))
entry.deps: num(detectives-3, Two-1) amod(detectives-3, accomplished-2) nsubj(arrived-6, detectives-3) prep_from(detectives-3, Cork-5) root(ROOT-0, arrived-6)

entry.sentence: They inspected the scene of the crime .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP They)) (VP (VBD inspected) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN scene)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN crime))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(inspected-2, They-1) root(ROOT-0, inspected-2) det(scene-4, the-3) dobj(inspected-2, scene-4) det(crime-7, the-6) prep_of(scene-4, crime-7)

entry.sentence: There was no doubt that the large pit had been freshly dug .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (DT no) (NN doubt) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (DT the) (JJ large) (NN pit)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN been) (NP (RB freshly) (JJ dug)))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: expl(was-2, There-1) root(ROOT-0, was-2) det(doubt-4, no-3) advmod(was-2, doubt-4) mark(dug-12, that-5) det(pit-8, the-6) amod(pit-8, large-7) nsubj(dug-12, pit-8) aux(dug-12, had-9) cop(dug-12, been-10) advmod(dug-12, freshly-11) ccomp(doubt-4, dug-12)
